channel.title: Parnian Lali - immich
channel.description: Hey, I'm Parnian - AI developer, researcher and I have a great passion for learning new things.

item.title: Migrating Immich from Docker to NixOS
item.author: Diogo Correia
item.description: This is a quick post on how I migrated my Immich deployment from Docker to a native NixOS module, and how you can do the same.
